name: RPC Destruction Simulator
description:
NOTE: This game is currently in DEMO mode. The second map (Austral War Base) is bugged.

A experimental sandbox game currently in the making themed around the RPC Authority. The RPC Authority ioperates in secrecy as an international extragovernmental agency which protects Humanity from threats to normalcy. The Authority works to suppress, destroy or understand anomalies in reality which can have harmful effects on human society, culture, thought and existence. Those anomalies are then contained and designated as RPCs, with a unique number after.

Currently, you can play as 2 RPC anomalies in this game. They are:

RPC-042, The Screeching Cries

RPC-341, AMALGAMATE, Or Children of Wrath
